document.discussion_title: Take A Look Inside Conor McGregor's UFC 202 Afterparty
document.topic_text: 3 minutes ago 0 Shares Take A Look Inside Conor McGregor's UFC 202 Afterparty Jack Kenmare in other Conor McGregor left the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas a winner after he defeated Nate Diaz via majority in arguably the greatest UFC event of all time. In the end, the judges scored the bout 48-47 McGregor, 47-47, 48-47, awarding a majority decision. After months of talk, Conor McGregor silenced the doubters and he celebrated in typical fashion. He was the centre of attention at Intrigue club in Las Vegas, as fireworks and bottles of champagne popped around him. McGregor celebrates UFC 202 win over Diaz with Las Vegas after-party https://t.co/wm2GQSS0xZ #wots pic.twitter.com/eo9LROVXaB - What's on the Social (@wotstoday) August 21, 2016 The scenes after the fight were insane and he took that atmosphere with him as revelers partied with 'Notorious' hours after he claimed victory over Diaz. Here's a clip of McGregor entertaining the crowds in the early hours of Sunday morning: He celebrated the win with friends Niall Horan and Rory McIlroy at the post-fight party: Niall Horan and Rory McIlroy joined Conor McGregor at an exclusive after-fight party in Las Vegas last night. pic.twitter.com/qJM7OGuBdR - Love Belfast :heart: (@love_belfast) August 21, 2016 What a night for Conor McGregor. It now looks like a rematch with Diaz is on the cards, with the bouts currently being tied at 1-1. Promoted links from around the web Next Up...
